title: The Gates of Golorath
description: The Gates of Golorath is a fantasy fiction that weaves magical, military and humorous elements together to make one serious epic series. The Chaos of Souls Series is filled with fast-paced action, intricate world building, and life-like characters that will quickly become your favorites.The Gates are portals that protect the Lethen’al from the outside world. They ventured here long ago to escape the threat of the Apostate, but some dangers come from within.  Angus and Arielle were once childhood friends who were ripped apart. Their parents hold the incredible secret as to why. After many years, they unexpectedly meet again to complete their military training at the Gates. Competing amongst themselves and the other cadets, Angus and Arielle’s squads struggle for prominence and acceptance. Mishaps and mischief mar their course. As Angus and Arielle are drawn closer and the tensions between their squads mount, their secret is revealed. Those around them begin to fear what they could become and what it means for the fate of their people.
author: R.M. Garino
